Headline: #12 Roosevelt Temporary Reroute at Roosevelt/Cicero
ShortDescription: 12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Roosevelt, Kostner, 16th, Laramie and Roosevelt due to police activity near Roosevelt/Cicero

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Roosevelt, Kostner, 16th, Laramie and Roosevelt then resume their normal route on Roosevelt, due to police activity near Roosevelt/Cicero .

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #54 Cicero Temporary Reroute at Roosevelt/Cicero
ShortDescription: 54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, Harrison, Laramie, 16th and Cicero: due to police activity near Roosevelt/Cicero

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, Harrison, Laramie, 16th and Cicero: due to police activity near Roosevelt/Cicero

Headline: #35 31st/35th Temporary Reroute near 35th/Shields
ShortDescription: 35 31st/35th buses temp. rrtd WB via 35th, Wentworth, 39th, Halsted & 35th; EB via 35th, Halsted, 39th, LaSalle & 35th due to street blockage near 35th/Shields.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#35 31st/35th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near 35th/Shields.

  • Westbound buses will operate via 35th, Wentworth, 39th, Halsted, then resume their normal route on 35th.
  • Eastbound buses will operate via 35th, Halsted, 39th, LaSalle, then resume their normal route on 35th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Jackson. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier police activity at Jackson. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
